content.raw:
It would be nice to get these changes into the 8.3 release, what do you think about moving the plugin and world to the examples folder for now? This way it won't be installed and we can make API breaking changes to it.

I'm thinking mostly about the use case for ServiceSim and I imagine we may want to do other tweaks to the collision shapes and surface properties, so we might use a different version of this plugin instead.
content.html:
It would be nice to get these changes into the 8.3 release, what do you think about moving the plugin and world to the examples folder for now? This way it won't be installed and we can make API breaking changes to it.

I'm thinking mostly about the use case for ServiceSim and I imagine we may want to do other tweaks to the collision shapes and surface properties, so we might use a different version of this plugin instead.
